title: Estate in Deadly HK Fire Won’t Be Reused as Housing, RTHK Says
description: The Hong Kong government doesn’t plan to reuse the devastated housing estate that was involved in the city’s deadliest fire in nearly eight decades as a residential area, a government minister told broadcaster RTHK.
content: The Hong Kong government doesn’t plan to reuse the devastated housing estate that was involved in the city’s deadliest fire in nearly eight decades as a residential area, a government minister told broadcaster RTHK.
